t: InfuseZen Turkish Towels - Modern Peshtemals for the Bath or Beach
s: Infusezen Turkish towels are a modern twist on a traditional peshtemal. Our hammam towels make wonderful sand free beach towels or luxury bath sheets. These oversized towels are the best quality towels and they are thin and lightweight making them easy to travel with.
